name: 200th Anniversary of the Founding of Utrecht University
obverse: Minerva stands holding a spear and shield and wearing a helmet. On the shield is the coat of arms of Utrecht.
reverse: A wreath composed of half laurel and half ivy encloses an inscription in 9 lines.
reverse_inscriptions: ACADEMIAE TRAIECTINAE ALTERIS SAECVLARIBVS. ACTIS PIAM. FESTI. MEMORIAM HOC. MONVMENTO CONSECRARVNT CVRATORES MDCCCXXXVI
references: Openbare verzamelingen der Gemeente Utrecht: catalogus van het Museum #1943
description: This medal was made to commemorate the 200th anniversary of the founding of Utrecht University.
